As an attorney, it is generally okay to consult with firm colleagues on a client's case without notifying the client. However, an attorney must make sure to avoid creating an actual or potential conflict of interest by maintaining appropriate boundaries and by using due care in consulting colleagues to avoid any possible prejudice to the clients.
